Address.value: 18501 EAST SAN JOSE AVENUE, CITY OF INDUSTRY, California, 91748, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Torrid Holdings Inc is a direct-to-consumer brand of apparel, intimates and accessories in North America targeting the 25- to 40-year old woman. It is focused on fit and offers high quality products across a broad assortment that includes tops, bottoms, denim, dresses, intimates, activewear, footwear and accessories.
